data.title: Genealogy of the Royal Family of Bavaria
data.text:
HRH Maria Elisabeth Franziska Josepha Therese Princess of Bavaria

* Nymphenburg Palace, September 9th, 1914

Married:

Nymphenburg Palace, August 19th, 1937:

HI & RH Pedro Henrique Afonso Felipe Maria Miguel Gabriel Rafael Prince of Orl�ans and Bragan�a

* Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, September 13th, 1909

 Vassouras, July 5th, 1981

Head of the Imperial Family of Brazil, November 14th, 1921

HRH Dorothea Theresa Marie Franziska Princess of Bavaria

* Schlo� Leutstetten, May 25th, 1920

Married:

(civil) S�rv�r, August 2nd and (religious) S�rv�r, August 3rd, 1938:

HI & RH Gottfried Maria Joseph Peter Ferdinand Hubert Anton Rupert Leopold Heinrich Ignaz Alfons Prince Imperial and Archduke of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary and Bohemia, Prince of Tuscany

* Linz, March 14th, 1902

 Bad Ischl, January 21st, 1984

HRH Luitpold Rupprecht Heinrich Prince of Bavaria

* Schlo� Leutstetten, April 14th, 1951

Married:

(morganatic) (civil) Starnberg, June 25th and (religious) Kloster Andechs, Erling-Andechs, September 26th, 1979:

Katrin Beatrix Wiegand

* Munich, September 19th, 1951

(The marriage was acknowledged as dynastic by Duke Franz, March 3rd, 1999)

Children from this marriage:

HRH Auguste Marie Philippa Princess of Bavaria

(Born as: Auguste Marie Philippa Prinzessin von Bayern)

* Landsberg am Lech, October 11th, 1979

HRH Alice Isabelle Marie Princess of Bavaria

(Born as: Alice Isabelle Marie Prinzessin von Bayern)

* Landsberg am Lech, June 25th, 1981

HRH Ludwig Heinrich Prince of Bavaria

(Born as: Ludwig Heinrich Prinz von Bayern)

* Landsberg am Lech, June 14th, 1982

HRH Heinrich Rudolf Prince of Bavaria

(Born as: Heinrich Rudolf Prinz von Bayern)

* Landsberg am Lech, January 23rd, 1986

HRH Karl Rupprecht Prince of Bavaria

(Born as: Karl Rupprecht Prinz von Bayern)

* Munich, March 10th, 1987

H Ill H Maria Elisabeth Therese Eleonore Walburga Monika Countess von Waldburg zu Zeil und Trauchburg

* Glash�tte near Wengen, January 6th, 1954

Married:

(civil) Zeil Castle, April 30th and (religious) Zeil Castle, May 23rd, 1980:

Hans-Caspar Heribert Veit Friedrich Count zu Toerring-Jettenbach

* Munich, July 22nd, 1953

H Ill H Maria Theresia Monika Walburga Countess von Waldburg zu Zeil und Trauchburg ("Therese")

* Munich, January 19th, 1960

Married:

(civil) Gr�nwald near Munich, July 23rd and (religious) Zeil Castle, September 6th, 1980:

Friedrich Wilhelm von Hesler

* Munich, January 16th, 1952

Children from this marriage:

Carl Friedrich von Hesler

* Solana Beach, California, March 24th, 1983

Nikolaus von Hesler

* Munich, August 28th, 1985

Konstantin von Hesler

* Munich, April 10th, 1987

Marie Charlotte von Hesler

* Munich, January 27th, 1991

HRH Elisabeth Maria Immaculata Anastasia Princess of Bavaria

* Schlo� Leutstetten, January 22nd, 1959

Married:

(civil) Horn, May 9th and (religious) Eberau, May 24th, 1986:

Andreas Ferdinand Alfons Eduard Maria Count von Kuefstein

* Vienna, August 9th, 1954

Children from this marriage:

Marie-Isabell Countess von Kuefstein

* Horn, February 26th, 1987

Marie-Carolin Countess von Kuefstein

* Horn, August 14th, 1988

Marie-Eleonor Countess von Kuefstein

* Horn, July 6th, 1990

Johann Ludwig Count von Kuefstein

* Horn, April 22nd, 1996

 Horn, April 22nd, 1996

Marie-Amelie Countess von Kuefstein

* Horn, April 2nd, 1997

HRH Wolfgang Rupprecht Maria Theodor Prince of Bavaria

* Schlo� Leutstetten, January 28th, 1960

Married:

(civil) Starnberg, November 16th, 1990 and (religious) Stift Vorau, April 6th, 1991:

Beatrice Countess zu Lodron-Laterano und Castelromano

* Vienna, May 29th, 1964

Children from this marriage:

HRH Tassilo Maria Georg Eugen Heinrich Rasso Prince of Bavaria

* Ravensburg, June 19th, 1992

HRH Richard Maria Philipp Stephan Maximilian Prince of Bavaria

* Munich, November 19th, 1993

HRH Philipp Maria Max Emanuel Rupprecht Zeno Prince of Bavaria

* Munich, May 25th, 1996

HRH Benedikta Maria Gabrielle Princess of Bavaria

* Starnberg, March 13th, 1961

Married:

(civil) Haldenwang Castle, June 4th and (religious) Wettenhausen, June 11th, 1989:

Rudolf Johannes Eugen Conrad Wolfram Romuald Cornelius Kaspar Arbogast Freiherr von Freyberg-Eisenberg

* Munich, February 7th, 1958

Children from this marriage:

Maria della Neve Freiin von Freyberg-Eisenberg

* Lauingen, September 26th, 1990

Konrad Freiherr von Freyberg-Eisenberg

* Lauingen, February 16th, 1992

Michael Freiherr von Freyberg-Eisenberg

* Lauingen, November 21st, 1993

Ludovica Freiin von Freyberg-Eisenberg

* Catania, November 7th, 1997
